headlines.description: — Jesús Sánchez hit a leadoff homer and a game-ending triple, finishing with three hits and four RBI as the Miami Marlins came back to beat the Chicago Cubs 8-7 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sánchez hits leadoff homer and game-ending triple to lift Marlins over Cubs 8-7

headlines.description: — Austin Hays had three hits and two RBI, and scored the go-ahead run on Monday night as the Cincinnati Reds beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 7-1 for their fifth consecutive victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Austin Hays, Nick Lodolo lead Reds to their fifth consecutive victory, 7-1 over scuffling Pirates

headlines.description: — Jarren Duran had a double and a triple as the Boston Red Sox tagged Mets ace Kodai Senga for three runs — the most he has given up all season — and beat New York 3-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jarren Duran has triple and double off Mets ace Kodai Senga to lead Red Sox to 3-1 victory

events.name: New York Mets at Boston Red Sox

headlines.description: — Jake Meyers hit a go-ahead home run, and Josh Hader stranded a runner on third in the ninth inning to preserve the Houston Astros' 4-3 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jake Meyers hits go-ahead HR, Josh Hader gets 12th save as Astros beat Rays 4-3

events.name: Houston Astros at Tampa Bay Rays

headlines.description: — William Contreras went 4 for 4 and hit a tiebreaking two-out single in the eighth inning as the Milwaukee Brewers won 5-4 on Monday night to hand the Baltimore Orioles their seventh consecutive loss.
headlines.shortLinkText: Contreras' RBI single in 8th helps Brewers win 5-4, hand Orioles their 7th straight loss

notes.headline: Will resume at 6:10 ET on May 20

headlines.description: — The Cleveland Guardians-Minnesota game was suspended in the fourth inning Monday night after a second rain delay with the Twins leading 2-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Guardians-Twins game suspended in fourth inning due to rain

headlines.description: — Brandon Pfaadt became the first seven-game winner in the majors, Lourdes Gurriel Jr., Gabriel Moreno and Geraldo Perdomo each hit a two-run homer, and the Arizona Diamondbacks beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 9-5 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pfaadt earns MLB-best 7th win as the Diamondbacks beat the scuffling Dodgers 9-5

events.name: Arizona Diamondbacks at Los Angeles Dodgers
